resources.description: Pitch-by-pitch Statcast data for Japanese MLB pitchers (2015-2025). 118,226 rows, 119 columns.
Pitch-by-pitch Statcast data for Japanese MLB batters (2015-2025). 56,362 rows, 119 columns.
Player metadata for all 34 Japanese MLB players: MLBAM ID, name, role, team(s), NPB team, seasons, notes.
